value.stringValue: Builds trip draw update: bursary for {!$Record.FirstName}
re: WestJet round trip flight draw: approval for {!$Record.FirstName}

Flow.description: sends emails to parents for approval

recordUpdates.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_drip_plus
recordUpdates.label: Copy 1 of Copy 1 of drip plus

textTemplates.name: Build_email_1
textTemplates.text:
I hope you enjoyed the LiveDifferent assembly you just had at {!$Record.CompanyOrAccount}!

Thank you for your interest in the Builds draw for $500 toward a Builds trip—a 9-day journey to Mexico or the Dominican Republic that's all about pursuing your passions, making a difference in the lives of others, and creating memories that last a lifetime.

To finalize your entry to the draw please click HERE!

We will be making the draw on {!draw_date_text}.

Stay curious,

{!$Record.Lead.Owner:User.FirstName}{!$Record.Contact.Owner.FirstName}🚀

textTemplates.name: builds_email_2_reminder
textTemplates.text:
Hi!

I wanted to remind you that the Builds draw for a $500 bursary for a student at {!$Record.CompanyOrAccount} will be happening on {!draw_date_text}

To finalize your entry to the draw please click HERE!

Thanks,

{!$Record.Lead.Owner:User.FirstName}{!$Record.Contact.Owner.FirstName}🚀

textTemplates.name: Parent_Email_1_no_draw
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Parent_First_Name__c},

This is {!Owner.FirstName} from LiveDifferent - a Canadian youth charity. {!$Record.FirstName} has entered a draw for a $500 bursary to a LiveDifferent Build.

Builds are life-changing ~9-day trips for students to the Dominican Republic or Mexico where they join in building a house with a family in need. While volunteering on a Build, students experience personal growth, create meaningful connections with each other and the local community members, and learn about new cultures, all in a welcoming, safe environment.

Learn more about Builds HERE

To ensure that the bursary is more likely to go to a student who will be able to use it, we are requesting parent/guardian approval.

Click HERE to approve {!$Record.FirstName} to enter the draw.

Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions!

{!Owner.FirstName} {!Owner.LastName}
LiveDifferent
1-866-432-4464

textTemplates.name: Parent_Email_2
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Parent_First_Name__c},

I thought I'd send a quick reminder about the draw for the Westjet Flights for a Builds trip.

If you aren't interested, no problem! But just incase you forgot,HERE is the link again to approve {!$Record.FirstName} to enter the draw.

Let me know if you have any questions!

{!$Record.Lead.Owner:User.FirstName}{!$Record.Contact.Owner.FirstName} {!$Record.Lead.Owner:User.LastName}{!$Record.Contact.Owner.LastName}
LiveDifferent
1-866-432-4464

textTemplates.name: Parent_Email_3
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Parent_First_Name__c} and {!$Record.FirstName},

This is Jenn Quong here, I’m the Director of International Programming for LiveDifferent, and I have an update about the Builds bursary that {!$Record.FirstName} applied for:

  • Unfortunately, we didn’t draw {!$Record.FirstName} specifically for the {!$Record.CompanyOrAccount} bursary.
  • Fortunately, we presently have a few unclaimed $500 bursaries, available on a first-come, first-served basis for public trips.
  • Even better: Recognizing the impact of shared experiences, we're also offering these first-come first-served bursariesfor a friend, parent, or family member to join the Build as well.

I’m a parent of two teenagers myself, so I understand that, if you have never done a trip like this before, it could seem a bit intimidating!

As a former school principal, however, I know just how life-changing and enriching these Build trips are for youth. I’d love to be able to provide any support or reassurance that you might need to make it a reality. Feel free to grab a time in my calendar, or here is my cell phone number: 905-802-7880. I’m happy to answer any questions that either of you might have.

And, when you are ready, here's how to proceed:

  • Choose an upcoming public Build here.
  • Register, and then let me know via email or txt. I'll ensure your bursary is applied.

Best Regards,

Jenn Quong
Jennifer Quong
Director of International Programming
P 866 432 4464  M 905 802 7880 
W LiveDifferent.com
LiveDifferent
Keep up with the latest
Sign up for our newsletter
Life is about people.

textTemplates.name: ParentEmail
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Parent_First_Name__c},

This is {!Owner.FirstName} from LiveDifferent - a Canadian youth charity (we recently visited {!$Record.CompanyOrAccount}). {!$Record.FirstName} has entered a draw for round trip WestJet flights to participate in a LiveDifferent Build.

Builds are life-changing ~9-day trips for students to the Dominican Republic or Mexico where they join in building a house with a family in need. While volunteering on a Build, students experience personal growth, create meaningful connections with each other and the local community members, and learn about new cultures, all in a welcoming, safe environment.

Learn more about Builds HERE

To ensure that the WestJet tickets are more likely to go to a student who will be able to use it, we are requesting parent/guardian approval.

Click HERE to approve {!$Record.FirstName} to enter the draw.

The draw will take place at the end of the month, and we will be in contact if {!$Record.FirstName} is selected.

Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions!

{!Owner.FirstName} {!Owner.LastName}
LiveDifferent
1-866-432-4464
